hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: H H 15 3,5,7,9,11,1 * # every 2 months: Mar May Jul Sep Nov Jan

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "runs in PHP 8 already" exit
cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors #php 22.php jenkins --- OBSOLETE
#OK php quaardvark.php jenkins # generates 22.tar.gz
#OK php rem_marine_terr_desc.php jenkins '{"resource_id":"22"}' # generates 22_cleaned_MoF_habitat.tar.gz
#LAST STEP: OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources cp 22_cleaned_MoF_habitat.tar.gz AnimalDiversityWeb.tar.gz ls -lt 22_cleaned_MoF_habitat.tar.gz ls -lt AnimalDiversityWeb.tar.gz rm -f 22_cleaned_MoF_habitat.tar.gz
# Update Zenodo record: OK - but u migth want to check first before uploading to Zenodo cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors ###php update_Zenodo_record_using_EOL_resourceID_directly.php _ '{"resource_id":"AnimalDiversityWeb", "zenodo_id":"13321549"}'
